CHAT.comment: ARIZONA, Petitioner v. LEMON MONTREA JOHNSON.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOSEPH L. PARKHURST ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF TOBY J. HEYTENS ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANDREW J. PINCUS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JOSEPH L. PARKHURST ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:04 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
